content: The Blade Monk's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of the Monk and land your own combo with the massive sword he wields. Three swings are enough to deal a great amount of damage to your foe. The equipped effect is just as helpful, raising your attack after you've defeated an enemy. This is an excellent skill for crowds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blade_Monk_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Blade Monk Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Blade Monk Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Blade Monk's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of the Monk and land your own combo with the massive sword he wields. Three swings are enough to deal a great amount of damage to your foe. The equipped effect is just as helpful, raising your attack after you've defeated an enemy. This is an excellent skill for crowds.
